|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTA-119AG (WRTA-119AG_V01) :Default credentials are per the FCC manual. The default SSIDs for this device are '''linksys-a''' and '''linksys-g'''. Appears to support U-NII-2 channels but may not implement [[Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS)]] due to its age. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=224223 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (pictures) ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Credentials==== The (default) credentials are the same as the router's default credentials. 
Username: 
Password: admin
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
